github page setup

September 19, 2015 — 22:40

SPEND SO MUCH TIME ON DEBUGGING JEKYLL!!! I used Github page and Jekyll theme for thesis MASK, but apparently I forgot them all? Debugging is like you jump into a black hole and lose the sense of time…

Here are some useful lists if you want to use Jekyll theme.

  • Using Jekyll with Github Pages
  • Free Jekyll themes

It’s actually not that difficult, just have to be careful about the path setting, eg. { { PATH/NAME , prepend : site.baseurl } }. WTH is that?

This site was built using Jekyll and is hosted on Github
